title: Display Face on Purple Magazine Blog
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020111847im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202013-02-03%20at%206_6302.23.22%20PM.png)

Can anyone tell me what font this is?
author: notnecesarahlee

comments.content: hard for me to tell what the base font on this, but to my eyes it seems like a "regular" serif font that has been deliberately stretched out. The "U" especially speaks to me of it. Of course, there could really be a font like it but seems custom to me.
